skills.name: Neural Interface
skills.description: Establishes a direct link to the digital network, granting enhanced processing power and access to restricted data streams. +5 Intelligence.

skills.name: Data Scavenger
skills.description: Improves your ability to extract valuable information from corrupted data fragments and abandoned systems. +10% chance to find rare items.

skills.name: Cybernetic Augmentation
skills.description: Enhances physical capabilities through advanced cybernetics, increasing strength and resilience. +5 Strength, +5 Vitality.

skills.name: Reflex Enhancer
skills.description: Subliminal conditioning and neural implants sharpen reflexes, improving reaction time and evasion. +5 Dexterity, +5% Evasion.

skills.name: Glitch Harnessing
skills.description: Learns to exploit system glitches and anomalies to gain temporary advantages in combat. Chance to trigger a random buff on hit.

skills.name: Adaptive Camouflage
skills.description: Integrates advanced camouflage systems that dynamically adapt to the environment, improving stealth and evasion. +10% Stealth, +5% Evasion.

skills.name: Arc
skills.description: Chains electricity to strike multiple enemies.

skills.name: Cleave
skills.description: A powerful melee attack that strikes all enemies in a wide arc.

skills.name: Cyclone
skills.description: Spins rapidly, dealing continuous damage to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Fireball
skills.description: Launches a fiery projectile that explodes on impact.

skills.name: Summon Skeleton
skills.description: Summons an undead skeleton to fight by your side.

skills.name: Summon Spiders
skills.description: Summons a swarm of venomous spiders to attack your foes.
